```{r}
library(rmonad)
library(magrittr)
```

This simplest use of `monadR` is simply to propagate a failed state through a
program.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
pass(34) %>% sqrt %>%
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
read(datafile) %,=% "data"   %,,%

```
